posts.post_content:
I bought this awesome book from a fellow collector who had them at $82.00 last month.  

I read his post incorrectly and thought it was a different book on Old Judge so since I don't need two copies - I will sell it for $75.00ppd.

(I barely opend the box, saw the binding and shut it so as to minimize the effect of my error).

It's ready to go.  thanks

peter
